ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the METAL MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to improve the environmental effects monitoring provisions of the Regulations. The Amendments also include some administrative changes to improve linguistic consistency and readability of the Regulations and to reflect Environment Canadaâ€™s current organizational structure.
